text: Siran man so inikalimo siran o Allah a manga nabi; a pd ko moriyataw o Adam, go pd ko riyoran Ami (ko kapal) a pd o Noh, go pd ko kiyababadan ko Ibrahim go so Israil, - go pd ko taw a tiyoro Ami go pinili Ami. Igira a pphangadian kiran so manga ayat o (Allah a) Masalinggagaw, na pzondong siran a khisosodiod go pphamanÂ´gad
